title: 500 Blue Textured Vase Filler Marbles - Bulk Marbles, About 6 Lbs. 5/8” inch Glass Marbles for Home Décor, Marble Run Game, Toy Marbles for Kids, Slingshot Ammo, Fish Tank, Classic Children’s Game
features: SUPERB QUALITY – Quality is an area in which we never compromise, and it is evident from the craftsmanship and design of these marbles how much we care. Each of the 500 textured marbles have unique “sesame styled” pattern in them making them exceptionally beautiful and original. Collecting marbles and studying their unique patterns is a fun hobby and these marbles are the perfect beginner pack for collecting, studying, and trading marbles

STUNNING ROOM DÉCOR – These bright blue sesame marbles add fun and pizzazz to any room. Use as a vase and bowl filler or place them in your fish tank and aquarium. Use in a party centerpiece or as table scatter. Add color to a child’s room or use around the house. Create exciting and original crafts and mosaics. You are limited only by your imagination!

SCREEN-FREE CLASSIC GAME – Marbles are a screen free classic that can help show children that there fun and entertaining ways to spend their time without electronics. Whether you are playing Chinese checkers, marble runs, aggravation, or any classic marbles games, playing and trading marbles is and always will be a classic and will provide your child with quality screen-free time

FOOT MASSAGE TO SLING-SHOT AMMO – These marbles are truly versatile. The unique texture of these marbles makes them great for massages, particularly foot massages with warm water and Epsom salt after a long day. At the same time, they make for excellent slingshot ammo as they are the perfect size and weight, balanced, hard, and can be used with any slingshot. Perfect for target practice and hunting. Since they’re reusable you can use them for any number of the hundreds of uses for these marbles

HASSLE FREE 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – If you are, for ANY reason not 100% satisfied with these marbles simply contact us and we’ll refund you. It’s that simple. No return necessary and no explanation needed on why you don’t like it. As a family business, we are dedicated and committed to customer service and you will be astonished by our respond time and fabulous service
